app.title: TinyVerse Space
app.subtitle: Building a private safehouse for you in the digital world.

password.title: Password
password.rule_text: At least 8 characters, including digits, uppercase and lowercase letters and symbols.
password.save_hint: Save local password to service node for password retrieval? Note that the local password is only used to encrypt data stored locally.
password.confirm_error: New password cannot be the same as old password
password.hint_one: Please change the default password as soon as possible to ensure data security.

index.create_hint: Create a web3 account with just one click, without requiring any personal privacy data.

token.title: Token
token.create_wallet_chain: Please back up your mnemonic phrase properly
token.add_wallet_method_error: Wrong choice of wallet creation method.
token.edit_wallet_name_error: The new name is the same as the original name!
token.backup_phrase_hint:
Please keep the following information in mind 
 If I reveal my mnemonic phrase to anyone, my assets may be stolen. 
The responsibility for protecting the mnemonic phrase lies entirely with me.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.nft_point_placeholder: Please enter the fee of transferred NFT

file.title: File
file.download_toast: Do you want to download the file?

gun.title: GUN
gun.search_input: Enter the GUN you want to search
gun.search_hint: User's global unique name (GUN) can be used anywhere. For example, friends can find you by name, and the name will also show in other apps supporting GUN protocol.
gun.rule_text: Name is case insensitive, can only use letters a-z and numbers 0-9, at least 8 characters.
gun.price_soon: This is not yet open, so stay tuned

data.title: Network Data
data.hint: Network data lists all user data backed up on the web3 decentralized storage network. Here user can see the relevant information and synchronization status of the data.

award.title: Bonus Tasks
award.hint: Complete tasks and get points rewards: We will update the tasks that can get rewards from time to time, so that users can have enough points to use various functions. The basic condition for obtaining bonus points is that the identity verification has been completed and the account has been backed up.
award.hint_one: Enter the invitation code to get bonus points

invite.title: Invite friends to earn points
invite.code_hint: Each time you successfully invite a friend, the inviter and the invitee will each be rewarded with 50 TVS.
invite.hint: Invite you to learn about TinyVerse
invite.hint_one: Scan the QR code to download TinyVerse

receive.title: Receive Points
receive.code_hint: Enter invitation code, and both you and the inviter will receive 50TVS. Please note that the invitation code is unique and cannot be changed.

level.title: Security Level
level.hint_one: The account security level is calculated based on the recovery path and the factors that need to be verified when recovering.
level.hint: Only My Profile is exposed externally, all other data is encrypted by the user's private key and stored in personal digital space.
level.zero: Temporary account, cannot be recovered, data may be lost at any time, please do account maintenance ASAP.
level.one: The account relies on high-risk plaintext mnemonics. Please use a vault to securely store mnemonics and add a recovery method.
level.two: The account only has a mnemonic recovery method. Please add a recovery method to avoid a single point of failure ASAP.
level.three: The account only has a guardian recovery method. Please add a recovery method to avoid a single point of failure ASAP.
level.four: Low standard accounts, please add Authentication factors to improve account security level.
level.five: Standard account, your account has been fully protected.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.qrcode_add: Scan QR code to add me as friend.

local_safe.title: Local Security Policy
local_safe.hint: The local security policy is used to verify the user's identity when unlocking the APP and using some sensitive functions, and it is only saved locally. Users must change the default password before activating biometrics. If the user forgets the password and cannot use biometrics such as fingerprint recognition or face recognition to verify the user's identity, he can reset the password by recovering the account.

encrypted_safe.hint: The vault is used to protect data that cannot be encrypted with private key but must be kept on the network, such as account recovery information. The vault works by using feature data to protect secrets. Feature data is unique to each individual, can be used to identify a person, has certain privacy, but does not rely on user memory. Biometrics like fingerprints and iris are best sources. Other options are digits that won't change for life, like ID number, or even commonly used memorable passwords. To recover data, any set of feature data can be used. More feature data means easier account recovery. Please provide at least 2 different sets of feature data for dual insurance. Feature data is kept in user account, inaccessible to anyone.
encrypted_safe.title: Encrypted Vault

toast.retry_download: The mnemonic encrypted file has been modified. Please download it again. Please save it!
toast.error_1: Please enter at least two types of content
toast.error_5: Please enter at least one item

protector.title: Guardian
protector.delete_hint: Do you want to delete the guardian?
protector.hint: Adopt 2/2 SSS scheme, one shard encrypted and kept in DAuth, the other encrypted and kept in DKVS. Shard data needs to be kept in the vault.
protector.hint_two: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

phrase.title: Mnemonic Phrase
phrase.hint: Mnemonic phrase is very important, please keep it safe and do not backup online.
phrase.hint_one: Encrypt mnemonic phrase with encrypted vault?
phrase.hint_two: Displaying and writing down mnemonic phrase directly is dangerous, you need to put in more effort to keep it safe

question.title: Intelligent Privacy
question.hint: Intelligent Privacy Backup is a self-custodial private key backup solution. User's personal privacy information is used to generate shards via MPC-SSS, which are kept in distributed storage network. All computation happens locally, all data is kept in user's own digital space, ensuring data security. Please fill out the form correctly, can leave blank (synced with personal info). If personal info changes, account maintenance is needed to prevent loss.

toast.error_1: The answer is at least 16 digits, please enter more content
toast.error_2: Please fill in at least two categories of question answers
toast.error_4: Fill in at least one question

multi_verify.title: Multi-factor Authentication
multi_verify.private_hint: Using personal private data to set up a encrypted vault for storing key shards.
multi_verify.protector_hint: Binding personal additional accounts for identity verification when retrieving key shards.
multi_verify.hint: The account backup can only be performed after the settings of the vault and guardian are completed.

about.title: About
about.description: An open-source, IPFS-based, decentralized tool for secure storage and management of personal privacy data where users have full control over their data and no third party can access user data.

tree.title: Account Management
tree.hint: Our account is a self-managed web3 account, which is the core basis for users to fully control their own data and control data ownership. Here we provide tools to allow users to quickly and easily back up their accounts to ensure the security of their accounts. Important note: If you do not back up your account, user data will be permanently lost.

search.empty: Please enter recipient public key or GUN name

restore.title: Account Recovery
restore.hint_password: Restore with default password, please change password later

toast.error_1: Answer at least one full question!
